item.title: Retrospective primitives - cohesion
item.description:
In my last post I briefly described three primitives that I felt could form the basis in planning and guiding retrospective activities:

  • cohesion
  • vector
  • waste

This post will focus on the cohesion primitive and is based on cohesion’s essential question: How well is the team working together?

Cohesion is …

item.title: Primitives for retrospectives
item.description: Lately, I’ve been trying to work out a set of “primitives” for retrospectives that can apply to a range of project approaches, IT systems and organisational cultures. The idea is to have baseline concepts (primitives) that can be used to guide thought and discussion. To aid my thinking I …
